{
    "number": 350391,
    "data": "1,1,1,2,3,4,5,6,8,11,15,19,24,30,41,56,72,91,115,153,209,269,345,436,571,780,1005,1292,1653,2131,2911,3751,4827,6191,7953,10864,14000,18034,23184,29681,40545,52249,67320,86617,111097,151316,194997",
    "name": "The largest denominator that can be made from n repeated applications of the maps f(x) = x + 1 or g(x) = -1/x, starting from 0.",
    "comment": [
        "Every rational number can be generated by repeated applications of the maps f(x) = x + 1 and g(x) = -1/x.",
        "For n > 0, a(n) is the maximum entry in row n of A226247."
    ],
    "link": [
        "Code Golf Stack Exchange, <a href=\"https://codegolf.stackexchange.com/q/240806/53884\">Iterate your way to a fraction</a>.",
        "Tom Davis, <a href=\"http://www.geometer.org/mathcircles/tangle.pdf\">Conway's Rational Tangles</a>."
    ],
    "example": [
        "For n = 0, a(0) = 1 because 0/1  = 0.",
        "For n = 1, a(1) = 1 because 1/1  = f(0).",
        "For n = 2, a(2) = 1 because  2/1 = f(f(0)).",
        "For n = 3, a(3) = 2 because -1/2 = g(f(f(0))).",
        "For n = 4, a(4) = 3 because -1/3 = g(f(f(f(0)))).",
        "For n = 5, a(5) = 4 because -1/4 = g(f(f(f(f(0))))).",
        "For n = 6, a(6) = 5 because -1/5 = g(f(f(f(f(f(0)))))).",
        "For n = 7, a(7) = 6 because -1/6 = g(f(f(f(f(f(f(0))))))).",
        "For n = 8, a(8) = 8 because -3/8 = g(f(f(f(g(f(f(f(0)))))))."
    ],
    "program": [
        "(Python)",
        "from fractions import Fraction",
        "from itertools import count, islice",
        "def agen():",
        "    rats = {Fraction(0, 1)}",
        "    for n in count(1):",
        "        yield max(r.denominator for r in rats)",
        "        newrats = set()",
        "        for r in rats:",
        "            newrats.add(1+r)",
        "            if r != 0:",
        "                newrats.add(-1/r)",
        "        rats = newrats",
        "print(list(islice(agen(), 25))) # _Michael S. Branicky_, Jan 17 2022"
    ],
    "xref": [
        "Cf. A226247, A226248, A226249, A226250."
    ],
    "keyword": "nonn",
    "offset": "0,4",
    "author": "_Peter Kagey_, Jan 10 2022",
    "ext": [
        "a(42)-a(46) from _Michael S. Branicky_, Jan 17 2022"
    ],
    "references": 0,
    "revision": 42,
    "time": "2022-01-18T05:48:31-05:00",
    "created": "2022-01-18T05:48:31-05:00"
}
